statements: DELETE FROM identity_theft_data WHERE theft_location = 'New York' AND theft_date > '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM identity_theft_data WHERE victim_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM theft_methods WHERE description LIKE '%fraud%' AND method_id IN (SELECT method_id FROM theft_methods WHERE method_name = 'phishing');
DELETE FROM identity_theft_reports WHERE report_date = '2023-01-15' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM suspect_info WHERE suspect_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM theft_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM suspect_info WHERE suspect_id = 101 AND gender = 'M'
DELETE FROM theft_locations WHERE city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM IdentityTheftSuspects WHERE suspect_name = 'John Doe'
